title: Seeking an experienced and motivated Lead Engineer

content.text: Are you an experienced engineer looking for a new challenge? Are you ready to help us deliver the extraordinary? The Submarine Delivery Agency (SDA) is seeking a Lead Engineer to join our team in Filton, Bristol. You’ll work alongside a team of highly skilled professionals to support some of largest and most complex engineering programmes in the world. This is fascinating equipment with vital impact for national security. Working at the forefront of marine technology to oversee challenges unique to this industry, you’ll provide support to the Royal Navy and a significant contribution to the success of essential defence projects.
You’ll have the support to take your career to the next level and get plenty of benefits too. Discover more and apply today Lead Engineer
